testDemos.title: AI-Powered Task Manager
testDemos.description: A smart task management application that uses AI to prioritize tasks, suggest optimal scheduling, and provide productivity insights. Features include natural language task creation, intelligent reminders, and automated time blocking.
testDemos.tags: AI, Productivity, Task Management, NLP, Scheduling

testDemos.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
testDemos.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into business metrics, user behavior, and system performance. Features interactive charts, customizable widgets, and automated reporting capabilities.
testDemos.tags: Analytics, Dashboard, Real-time, Business Intelligence, Charts

testDemos.title: Smart E-commerce Platform
testDemos.description: An intelligent e-commerce platform with AI-powered product recommendations, dynamic pricing, inventory management, and personalized shopping experiences. Includes advanced search, reviews, and order tracking.
